get.description: Get financial summary report
Get monthly revenue data for charts
Get expenses grouped by category
Get top customers by revenue
Get dashboard overview data

Generate P&L (Profit & Loss) report

This endpoint:
1. Calculates total revenue from invoices and sales receipts
2. Calculates total expenses from bills and expenses
3. Computes net income (revenue - expenses)
4. Provides detailed breakdown by category

Generate Balance Sheet report

This endpoint:
1. Calculates total assets (current + fixed)
2. Calculates total liabilities (current + long-term)
3. Calculates total equity
4. Ensures assets = liabilities + equity

parameters.name: as_of_date

schema.description: As of date for balance sheet
schema.title: As Of Date

parameters.description: As of date for balance sheet

get.description:
Get detailed transactions for a specific account in a report

This endpoint provides drill-down functionality for all financial reports.
Users can click on any summary number to see the underlying transactions.

parameters.name: report_type

schema.description: Type of report (pnl, balance-sheet, ar-aging, etc.)
schema.title: Report Type

parameters.description: Type of report (pnl, balance-sheet, ar-aging, etc.)

parameters.name: account_id

schema.description: Account ID or code to drill down into
schema.title: Account Id

parameters.description: Account ID or code to drill down into

parameters.name: as_of_date

schema.description: As of date for balance sheet reports
schema.title: As Of Date

parameters.description: As of date for balance sheet reports

parameters.name: limit

schema.description: Maximum number of transactions to return
schema.title: Limit

parameters.description: Maximum number of transactions to return

get.description:
Generate comprehensive Cash Flow Statement

This endpoint:
1. Starts with Net Income from P&L
2. Calculates Operating Activities cash flows
3. Calculates Investing Activities cash flows
4. Calculates Financing Activities cash flows
5. Reconciles with actual cash balance changes

parameters.name: start_date

schema.description: Start date for Cash Flow statement
schema.title: Start Date

parameters.description: Start date for Cash Flow statement

parameters.name: end_date

schema.description: End date for Cash Flow statement
schema.title: End Date

parameters.description: End date for Cash Flow statement

parameters.name: start_date

schema.description: Start date for Cash Flow summary
schema.title: Start Date

parameters.description: Start date for Cash Flow summary

parameters.name: end_date

schema.description: End date for Cash Flow summary
schema.title: End Date

parameters.description: End date for Cash Flow summary

get.description:
Generate comprehensive Sales by Customer report

This endpoint:
1. Queries Invoices and SalesReceipts tables
2. Groups transactions by customer
3. Calculates total sales, order counts, and averages
4. Ranks customers by total sales
5. Provides customer insights and analysis

parameters.name: limit

schema.description: Maximum number of customers to return
schema.title: Limit

parameters.description: Maximum number of customers to return

parameters.name: include_inactive

schema.description: Include customers with no sales in period
schema.title: Include Inactive

parameters.description: Include customers with no sales in period

get.description: Get simplified Sales by Customer summary for dashboard
Get advanced analysis of sales by customer

Generate comprehensive Expenses by Vendor report

This endpoint:
1. Queries Bills and Expenses tables
2. Groups transactions by vendor
3. Calculates total expenses, transaction counts, and averages
4. Ranks vendors by total expenses
5. Provides vendor insights and analysis

parameters.name: limit

schema.description: Maximum number of vendors to return
schema.title: Limit

parameters.description: Maximum number of vendors to return

parameters.name: include_inactive

schema.description: Include vendors with no expenses in period
schema.title: Include Inactive

parameters.description: Include vendors with no expenses in period

get.description: Get simplified Expenses by Vendor summary for dashboard
Get advanced analysis of expenses by vendor

Generate General Ledger report

This endpoint:
1. Retrieves journal entries within date range
2. Calculates account balances
3. Provides detailed transaction history
4. Supports filtering by account code
